long_description: An essential tool for your triathlon or marathon training, the Craft proCOOL compression socks promote blood flow to lower leg muscles to improve performance during workouts and aid recovery. High-performance stretch polyester fabric cradles and supports muscles in the lower legs and feet; fabric also breathes well and dries quickly. Knee-high length. Closeout.
short_description: An essential tool for your triathlon or marathon training, the Craft proCOOL compression socks promote blood flow to lower leg muscles to improve performance during workouts and aid recovery.
